arts.ttl: Verdict: Man City hand Bompastor first loss as Chelsea manager
arts.sum: Sonia Bompastor was handed her first loss since becoming Chelsea boss, as Vivianne Miedema brace gave Man City a two-goal advantage in the Champions League Quarter final

arts.ttl: Man City hand Bompastor's Chelsea 1st loss
arts.sum: Vivianne Miedema's brace handed Chelsea their first defeat this season after City defeated the Women's Super League (WSL) leaders 2-0 in the first leg of their Champions League quarterfinal.

arts.ttl: Miedema double for Man City hands Bompastor first defeat as Chelsea boss
arts.sum: Manchester City dealt Sonia Bompastor her first defeat as Chelsea boss thanks to Vivianne Miedema's double off the bench to secure a 2-0 advantage in the first leg of the Women's Champions League quarter-final.

arts.ttl: Vivianne Miedema comes off the bench to fire Manchester City into first-leg lead
arts.sum: Chelsea substitute Johanna Rytting Kaneryd struck the crossbar at the other end.

arts.ttl: England star Lucy Bronze opens up on autism and ADHD and how diagnoses helped her on the pitch
arts.sum: Bronze has almost every accolade in womenâ€™s football and spoke for the first time about her neurodivergence

arts.ttl: Chelsea: Lucy Bronze opens up on ADHD and autism diagnosis
arts.sum: The right-back was diagnosed with autism and ADHD while away on an England camp in 2021

arts.ttl: Bompastor: Walsh fit for City QF, Girma still out
arts.sum: Chelsea boss Sonia Bompastor has confirmed that Kiera Walsh is available for their Champions League quarterfinal first leg against Manchester City but confirmed that United States defender Naomi Girma remains sidelined.

arts.ttl: Khadija Shaw injury update as Man City confirm blow ahead of Chelsea quarter-final
arts.sum: Shaw has been ruled out of the first leg and is a major doubt for the return in London

arts.ttl: Khadija Shaw injury update as Man City confirm blow ahead of Chelsea quarter-final
arts.sum: Shaw has been ruled out of the first leg and is a major doubt for the return in London
